author: Anthony Spadafora
title: Malicious Android apps use coronavirus to hack user devices
description: The Play Store and third-party app marketplaces have been flooded with coronavirus-related apps with many containing adware or malware.
content:
The number of coronavirus-related apps on the Google Play Store has increased significantly over the past few weeks as both legitimate developers and cybercriminals look to cash in on users' fears surrounding the virus.
By analyzing Android telemetry data, s… [+3020 chars]
